mapper.select: select * from diary where diary_status = 'Y' order by boardno desc
mapper.insert: insert into diary values(board_seq.nextval, #{mood}, #{weather}, #{privacyBounds}, #{location}, #{diaryDate}, #{diaryContent}, sysdate, sysdate, default, #{diaryWriter})
